message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. I can do better than $120, but I need to make a profit. How about $140?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $140 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a fair profit. How about $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $135 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm not willing to go as low as $125, Bob. I can do $132, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
